description.english: Kill an enemy with his own ripped part
description.schinese: 用敌人自己的部件杀死它

description.schinese: 用敌人自己的导弹杀死它

description.schinese: 用投掷物挡住一次射击

description.english: Kill an enemy with a thrown enemy
description.schinese: 用一个敌人杀死另一个敌人
